nodes.text: Benits Stinex, also known as "the Old Man", was a well known architect who designed a series of apartments in the Manarai Hills district of Coruscant. He later became the chief architect and head of interior design and construction board the Death Star. He was featured regularly in Beings Holozine. Despite his proficiency, while in the design process, Teela Kaarz altered some of his layouts for better accessibility and efficiency.
